amendment.description: An amendment to increase (by transfer) the funding for the account for Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration-Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services by $100 million.

action.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Ramstad amendment (A026). Mr. Regula stated that the amendment sought to provide funding for an unauthorized program. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Ramstad.
